str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To deliberate, take counsel, determine. From boule; to advise, i.e. deliberate, or resolve.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
